# **\#Empowering development transparency**

## forky

**â”€**

# **Overview**

# **Goals**

1. Organize tickets and company details for decreasing administrative backlog.

2. Improve outreach to clients about important details. (e.g: ticket status)

3. FAQ for an easier transition to the new system.

4. Create analytics for better ticket status tracking.

5. Make a status page breaking down current events in areas of operation.

6. Implement proper authentication with vouch.

# **Specifications**

Users can create and track tickets on the site. Employees could access separate backend with different administrative functions.

Each ticket should contain: feature request type \+ details

Status page shows current state of the services offered by Fingrid. Optionally any upcoming maintenance could be announced here and if a client is affected further outreach via SMS could be possible with 46elks.

Admin access should be implemented under subdomain behind Vouch-proxy for proper authentication. On the main site each company should have at least one main admin to handle changes of details.

Feedback about the feature requests via notifications on the site.

# **Possible integrations:**

1. ## [46elks](https://46elks.com)

   Reach your users with reliable text messages, near-instant delivery and an industry-wide 99% read rate.  Send out automated calls in case of an emergency.

2. ## E-mail with calendar reminder

   Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetuer adipiscing elit, sed diam nonummy nibh euismod tincidunt ut laoreet dolore magna aliquam erat volutpat.

3. ## Integrate ticketing API

   Automate ticket creation (e.g: Jira)

   

4. ## Integrate [Vouch-proxy](https://github.com/vouch/vouch-proxy) for employee use under subdomain
